snippet: An indigenous woman was burned alive in Paraguay after being accused of witchcraft, a local prosecutor confirmed Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: An indigenous woman was burned alive in Paraguay after being accused of witchcraft, a local prosecutor confirmed Wednesday.

headline.main: Paraguay: Indigenous Woman Suspected of Being a Witch Is Burned at the Stake
headline.print_headline: Paraguay: Indigenous Woman, Accused Of Witchcraft, Is Burned at the Stake
